item.title: Mapping UK Local Political Data
item.author: yourname@example.com (yourname)
item.description: For my PhD research, I needed to collect local political data for the UK. This article documents the data sources and procedure used to create a suitable dataset for my analysis. This provides a technical overview of the data. The R code used to create the analysis is available through GitHub here. Setup R was used to run the analysis. The code uses a number of packages to process the data:
